comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: Tommy Atkins is a leading U.K. Toy Soldier manufacturer.

comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Tommy Atkins is your generic British soldier. As in Kipling's poem www.uea.ac.uk/menu/acad_depts/edu/learn/braysher/tommy.htm The name is said to have been coined by the Duke of Wellington.

comment.author: 68958205@N05
comment._content: Retired at last is correct these are Tommies neither is actually named Tommy Atkins.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for the information.  This interesting assertion is confirmed by the dictionary. We'll add a note to the record the next time we update.
